TEXT.TITLE: LAC <LAC> FILES TO ISSUE FLOW-THROUGH SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Lac Minerals Ltd said it filed a preliminary prospectus for an initial offering in Canada of flow-through common shares. Size and pricing of the issue have not yet been determined, the company said. Reuter
